summary: This document is a mortgage loan application correspondence from Joann Brown, a Mortgage Loan Originator at Fifth Third Mortgage. It requests the recipient to review the enclosed documents related to their mortgage application and offers assistance for any questions regarding the home financing process.

persons.name: Joann Brown
persons.context: Joann Brown is the sender of the mortgage loan application correspondence, offering assistance regarding the loan process.

keyFacts: The document is a mortgage loan application correspondence dated October 24, 2014.
Joann Brown is identified as the Mortgage Loan Originator.
The correspondence is from Fifth Third Mortgage Company.
The document emphasizes that loans are subject to credit review and approval.
The company is noted as an Equal Housing Lender.
